   20: -module(systools_rc_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   23: -include_lib("sasl/src/systools.hrl").
   24: -export([all/0,groups/0,init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2, 
   25: 	 syntax_check/1, translate/1, translate_app/1,
   26: 	 translate_emulator_restarts/1,
   27: 	 translate_add_delete_module/1]).
   28: 
   29: all() -> 
   30:     [syntax_check, translate, translate_app, translate_emulator_restarts,
   31:      translate_add_delete_module].
   32: 
   33: groups() -> 
   34:     [].
   35: 
   36: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   37:     Config.
   38: 
   39: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   40:     Config.
   41: 
   42: 
   43: syntax_check(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   44:     PreApps =
   45: 	[#application{name = test,
   46: 		      description = "TEST",
   47: 		      vsn = "0.1",
   48: 		      modules = [foo,bar,baz,old_mod],
   49: 		      regs = [],
   50: 		      mod = {sasl, []}},
   51: 	 #application{name = snmp,
   52: 		      description = "SNMP",
   53: 		      vsn = "1.0",
   54: 		      modules = [snmp],
   55: 		      regs = [],
   56: 		      mod = {snmp, []}}],
   57:     Apps =
   58: 	[#application{name = test,
   59: 		      description = "TEST",
   60: 		      vsn = "1.0",
   61: 		      modules = [foo,bar,baz,new_mod],
   62: 		      regs = [],
   63: 		      mod = {sasl, []}}],
   64:     S1 = [
   65: 	  {update, bar, {advanced, extra}, brutal_purge, brutal_purge, []},
   66: 	  {update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]},
   67: 	  {update, baz, 5000, soft, brutal_purge, brutal_purge, []},
   68: 	  {add_module, new_mod},
   69: 	  {remove_application, snmp}
   70: 	 ],
   71:     {ok, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S1], Apps, PreApps),
   72:     S2 = [
   73: 	  {apply, {m, f, [a]}},
   74: 	  {load_object_code, {tst, "1.0", [new_mod]}},
   75:           point_of_no_return,
   76: 	  {update, bar, {advanced, extra}, brutal_purge, brutal_purge, []},
   77: 	  {update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]},
   78: 	  {load, {new_mod, soft_purge, soft_purge}},
   79: 	  {remove, {old_mod, soft_purge, soft_purge}},
   80: 	  {purge, [m1, m2]},
   81: 	  {suspend, [m1]},
   82: 	  {code_change, [{m1, extra}]},
   83: 	  {resume, [m1]},
   84: 	  {stop, [m3,m4]},
   85: 	  {start, [m3,m4]},
   86: 	  {sync_nodes, id1, {m, f, [a]}},
   87: 	  {sync_nodes, id2, [cp1, cp2]},
   88: 	  {apply, {m,f,[a]}},
   89: 	  restart_new_emulator,
   90: 	  restart_emulator
   91: 	 ],
   92:     {ok, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S2], Apps, []),
   93:     S3 = [{apply, {m, f, a}}],
   94:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S3], Apps, []),
   95:     S3_1 = [{apply, {m, 3, a}}],
   96:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S3_1], Apps, []),
   97:     S4 = [{apply, {m, f}}],
   98:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S4], Apps, []),
   99:     S5 = [{load_object_code, hej}],
  100:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S5], Apps, []),
  101:     S6 = [{load_object_code, {342, "1.0", [foo]}}],
  102:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S6], Apps, []),
  103:     S7 = [{load_object_code, {tets, "1.0", foo}}],
  104:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S7], Apps, []),
  105:     S8 = [{suspend, [m1]}, point_of_no_return],
  106:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S8], Apps, []),
  107:     S9 = [{update, ba, {advanced, extra}, brutal_purge, brutal_purge, []}],
  108:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S9], Apps, []),
  109:     S10 = [{update, bar, {advanced, extra}, brutal_purge, brutal_purge, [baz]}],
  110:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S10], Apps, []),
  111:     S11 = [{update, bar, {advanced, extra}, brutal_purge, brutal_purge, [ba]}],
  112:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S11], Apps, []),
  113:     S12 = [{update, bar, advanced, brutal_purge, brutal_purge, []}],
  114:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S12], Apps, []),
  115:     S13 = [{update, bar, {advanced, extra}, rutal_purge, brutal_purge, [ba]}],
  116:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S13], Apps, []),
  117:     S14 = [{update, bar, {advanced, extra}, brutal_purge, rutal_purge, [ba]}],
  118:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S14], Apps, []),
  119:     S15 = [{update, bar, {advanced, extra}, brutal_purge, brutal_purge, ba}],
  120:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S15], Apps, []),
  121:     S16 = [{code_change, [module]}],
  122:     {error, _, _} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S16], Apps, []),
  123:     ok.
  124: 
  125: translate(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  126:     Apps =
  127: 	[#application{name = test,
  128: 		      description = "TEST",
  129: 		      vsn = "1.0",
  130: 		      modules = [foo,bar,baz,
  131: 				 x,y,z],
  132: 		      regs = [],
  133: 		      mod = {sasl, []}}],
  134:     %% Simple translation (1)
  135:     Up1 = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, []}],
  136:     {ok, X1} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up1], Apps, []),
  137:     [{load_object_code, {test,"1.0",[foo]}},
  138:      point_of_no_return,
  139:      {suspend,[foo]},
  140:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  141:      {resume,[foo]}] = X1,
  142: 
  143:     %% Simple translation (2)
  144:     Up2 = [{update, foo, {advanced, extra}, soft_purge, soft_purge, []}],
  145:     {ok, X2} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up2], Apps, []),
  146:     [{load_object_code, {test,"1.0",[foo]}},
  147:      point_of_no_return,
  148:      {suspend,[foo]},
  149:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  150:      {code_change, up, [{foo, extra}]},
  151:      {resume,[foo]}] = X2,
  152: 
  153:     {ok, X22} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(dn,[Up2], Apps, []),
  154:     [{load_object_code, {test,"1.0",[foo]}},
  155:      point_of_no_return,
  156:      {suspend,[foo]},
  157:      {code_change, down, [{foo, extra}]},
  158:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  159:      {resume,[foo]}] = X22,
  160: 
  161:     Up2a = [{update, foo, static, default, {advanced,extra},
  162: 	     soft_purge, soft_purge, []}],
  163:     {ok, X2a} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up2a], Apps, []),
  164:     [{load_object_code, {test,"1.0",[foo]}},
  165:      point_of_no_return,
  166:      {suspend,[foo]},
  167:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  168:      {code_change, up, [{foo, extra}]},
  169:      {resume,[foo]}] = X2a,
  170: 
  171:     {ok, X22a} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(dn,[Up2a], Apps, []),
  172:     [{load_object_code, {test,"1.0",[foo]}},
  173:      point_of_no_return,
  174:      {suspend,[foo]},
  175:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  176:      {code_change, down, [{foo, extra}]},
  177:      {resume,[foo]}] = X22a,
  178: 
  179:     %% Simple dependency (1)
  180:     Up3 = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]},
  181: 	   {update, bar, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, []}],
  182:     {ok, X31} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up3], Apps, []),
  183:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar]}},
  184:      point_of_no_return,
  185:      {suspend,[foo,bar]},
  186:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  187:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  188:      {resume,[bar,foo]}] = X31,
  189:     {ok, X32} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(dn,[Up3], Apps, []),
  190:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar]}},
  191:      point_of_no_return,
  192:      {suspend,[foo,bar]},
  193:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  194:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  195:      {resume,[bar,foo]}] = X32,
  196: 
  197:     Up3a = [{update, foo, static, default, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]},
  198: 	    {update, bar, static, default, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, []}],
  199:     {ok, X3a1} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up3a], Apps, []),
  200:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar]}},
  201:      point_of_no_return,
  202:      {suspend,[foo, bar]},
  203:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  204:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  205:      {resume,[bar,foo]}] = X3a1,
  206:     {ok, X3a2} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(dn,[Up3a], Apps, []),
  207:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar]}},
  208:      point_of_no_return,
  209:      {suspend,[foo,bar]},
  210:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  211:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  212:      {resume,[bar,foo]}] = X3a2,
  213: 
  214:     %%  Simple dependency (2)
  215:     Up4 = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]},
  216: 	   {update, bar, {advanced, []}, soft_purge, soft_purge, []}],
  217:     {ok, X4} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(up,[Up4], Apps, []),
  218:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar]}},
  219:      point_of_no_return,
  220:      {suspend,[foo,bar]},
  221:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  222:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  223:      {code_change,up,[{bar,[]}]},
  224:      {resume,[bar,foo]}] = X4,
  225: 
  226:     {ok, X42} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(dn,[Up4], Apps, []),
  227:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar]}},
  228:      point_of_no_return,
  229:      {suspend,[foo,bar]},
  230:      {code_change,down,[{bar,[]}]},
  231:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  232:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  233:      {resume,[bar,foo]}] = X42,
  234: 
  235:     Up4a = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]},
  236: 	    {update, bar, static, infinity, {advanced, []},
  237: 	     soft_purge, soft_purge, []}],
  238:     {ok, X4a} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(up,[Up4a], Apps, []),
  239:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar]}},
  240:      point_of_no_return,
  241:      {suspend,[foo,{bar,infinity}]},
  242:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  243:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  244:      {code_change,up,[{bar,[]}]},
  245:      {resume,[bar,foo]}] = X4a,
  246: 
  247:     {ok, X42a} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(dn,[Up4a], Apps, []),
  248:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar]}},
  249:      point_of_no_return,
  250:      {suspend,[foo,{bar,infinity}]},
  251:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  252:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  253:      {code_change,down,[{bar,[]}]},
  254:      {resume,[bar,foo]}] = X42a,
  255: 
  256:     Up4b = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]},
  257: 	    {update, bar, dynamic, infinity, {advanced, []},
  258: 	     soft_purge, soft_purge, []}],
  259:     {ok, X4b} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(up,[Up4b], Apps, []),
  260:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar]}},
  261:      point_of_no_return,
  262:      {suspend,[foo,{bar,infinity}]},
  263:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  264:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  265:      {code_change,up,[{bar,[]}]},
  266:      {resume,[bar,foo]}] = X4b,
  267: 
  268:     {ok, X42b} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(dn,[Up4b], Apps, []),
  269:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar]}},
  270:      point_of_no_return,
  271:      {suspend,[foo,{bar,infinity}]},
  272:      {code_change,down,[{bar,[]}]},
  273:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  274:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  275:      {resume,[bar,foo]}] = X42b,
  276: 
  277:     %% More complex dependency
  278:     Up5 = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar, baz]},
  279: 	   {update, bar, {advanced, []}, soft_purge, soft_purge, []},
  280: 	   {update, baz, {advanced, baz}, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]}],
  281:     {ok, X5} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up5], Apps, []),
  282:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,baz,bar]}},
  283:      point_of_no_return,
  284:      {suspend,[foo,baz,bar]},
  285:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  286:      {load,{baz,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  287:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  288:      {code_change,up,[{baz,baz},{bar,[]}]},
  289:      {resume,[bar,baz,foo]}] = X5,
  290: 
  291:     {ok, X52} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(dn,[Up5], Apps, []),
  292:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,baz,bar]}},
  293:      point_of_no_return,
  294:      {suspend,[foo,baz,bar]},
  295:      {code_change,down,[{baz,baz},{bar,[]}]},
  296:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  297:      {load,{baz,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  298:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  299:      {resume,[bar,baz,foo]}] = X52,
  300: 
  301:     Up5a = [{update, foo, dynamic, infinity, soft, soft_purge,
  302: 	     soft_purge, [bar, baz]},
  303: 	    {update, bar, static, 7000, {advanced, []}, soft_purge,
  304: 	     soft_purge, []},
  305: 	    {update, baz, dynamic, default, {advanced, baz}, soft_purge,
  306: 	     soft_purge, [bar]}],
  307:     {ok, X5a} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up5a], Apps, []),
  308:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,baz,bar]}},
  309:      point_of_no_return,
  310:      {suspend,[{foo,infinity},baz,{bar,7000}]},
  311:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  312:      {load,{baz,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  313:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  314:      {code_change,up,[{baz,baz}, {bar,[]}]},
  315:      {resume,[bar,baz,foo]}] = X5a,
  316: 
  317:     {ok, X52a} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(dn,[Up5a], Apps, []),
  318:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,baz,bar]}},
  319:      point_of_no_return,
  320:      {suspend,[{foo,infinity},baz,{bar,7000}]},
  321:      {code_change,down,[{baz,baz}]},
  322:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  323:      {load,{baz,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  324:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  325:      {code_change,down,[{bar,[]}]},
  326:      {resume,[bar,baz,foo]}] = X52a,
  327: 
  328:     Up5b = [{update, foo, dynamic, infinity, soft, soft_purge,
  329: 	     soft_purge, [bar, baz]},
  330: 	    {update, bar, dynamic, 7000, {advanced, []}, soft_purge,
  331: 	     soft_purge, []},
  332: 	    {update, baz, static, default, {advanced, baz}, soft_purge,
  333: 	     soft_purge, [bar]}],
  334:     {ok, X5b} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up5b], Apps, []),
  335:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,baz,bar]}},
  336:      point_of_no_return,
  337:      {suspend,[{foo,infinity},baz,{bar,7000}]},
  338:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  339:      {load,{baz,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  340:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  341:      {code_change,up,[{baz,baz},{bar,[]}]},
  342:      {resume,[bar,baz,foo]}] = X5b,
  343: 
  344:     {ok, X52b} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(dn,[Up5b], Apps, []),
  345:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,baz,bar]}},
  346:      point_of_no_return,
  347:      {suspend,[{foo,infinity},baz,{bar,7000}]},
  348:      {code_change,down,[{bar,[]}]},
  349:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  350:      {load,{baz,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  351:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  352:      {code_change,down,[{baz,baz}]},
  353:      {resume,[bar,baz,foo]}] = X52b,
  354: 
  355:     %% Simple circular dependency (1)
  356:     Up6 = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]},
  357: 	   {update, bar, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [foo]}],
  358:     {ok, X61} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up6], Apps, []),
  359:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar]}},
  360:      point_of_no_return,
  361:      {suspend,[foo,bar]},
  362:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  363:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  364:      {resume,[bar,foo]}] = X61,
  365:     {ok, X62} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(dn,[Up6], Apps, []),
  366:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar]}},
  367:      point_of_no_return,
  368:      {suspend,[foo,bar]},
  369:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  370:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  371:      {resume,[bar,foo]}] = X62,
  372: 
  373:     %% Simple circular dependency (2)
  374:     Up7 = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar, baz]},
  375: 	   {update, bar, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [foo]},
  376: 	   {update, baz, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]}],
  377:     {ok, X71} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up7], Apps, []),
  378:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  379:      point_of_no_return,
  380:      {suspend,[foo,bar,baz]},
  381:      {load,{baz,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  382:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  383:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  384:      {resume,[baz, bar, foo]}] = X71,
  385:     {ok, X72} = systools_rc:translate_scripts(dn,[Up7], Apps, []),
  386:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  387:      point_of_no_return,
  388:      {suspend,[foo,bar,baz]},
  389:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  390:      {load,{bar,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  391:      {load,{baz,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  392:      {resume,[baz,bar,foo]}] = X72,
  393: 
  394:     %% Complex circular dependencies, check only order
  395:     %%
  396:     Up8 = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [baz]},
  397: 	   {update, y, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]},
  398: 	   {update, x, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [y, z]},
  399: 	   {update, z, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [x]},
  400: 	   {update, bar, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [baz]},
  401: 	   {update, baz, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]}],
  402:     {ok, X8} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up8], Apps, []),
  403:     {value, {suspend, Order}} = lists:keysearch(suspend, 1, X8),
  404:     Rest = case lists:reverse(Order) of
  405: 	       [bar, baz | R] -> R;
  406: 	       [baz, bar | R] -> R
  407: 	   end,
  408:     case Rest of
  409: 	[y, z, x, foo] -> ok;
  410: 	[y, x, z, foo] -> ok;
  411: 	[foo, y, z, x] -> ok;
  412: 	[foo, y, x, z] -> ok;
  413: 	[y, foo, z, x] -> ok;
  414: 	[y, foo, x, z] -> ok
  415:     end,
  416: 
  417:     %% Check that order among other instructions isn't changed
  418:     Up9 = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [baz]},
  419: 	   {apply, {m, f, [1]}},
  420: 	   {update, y, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]},
  421: 	   {apply, {m, f, [2]}},
  422: 	   {update, x, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [y, z]},
  423: 	   {apply, {m, f, [3]}},
  424: 	   {update, z, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [x]},
  425: 	   {apply, {m, f, [4]}},
  426: 	   {update, bar, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [baz]},
  427: 	   {apply, {m, f, [5]}},
  428: 	   {update, baz, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, [bar]},
  429: 	   {apply, {m, f, [6]}}],
  430:     {ok, X9} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up9], Apps, []),
  431:     Other2 = [X || {apply, {m, f, [X]}} <- X9],
  432:     [1,2,3,4,5,6] = lists:sort(Other2),
  433:     ok.
  434: 
  435: 
  436: translate_app(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  437:     PreApps =
  438: 	[Test = #application{name = test,
  439: 			     description = "TEST",
  440: 			     vsn = "1.0",
  441: 			     modules = [foo,bar,baz],
  442: 			     regs = [],
  443: 			     mod = {sasl, []}},
  444: 	 #application{name = pelle,
  445: 		      description = "PELLE",
  446: 		      vsn = "1.0",
  447: 		      modules = [pelle, kalle],
  448: 		      regs = [],
  449: 		      mod = {pelle, []}}],
  450:     Apps = [Test],
  451:     %% Simple translation (1)
  452:     Up1 = [{add_module, foo},
  453: 	   {add_module, bar}],
  454:     {ok, X1} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up1], Apps, []),
  455:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar]}},
  456:      point_of_no_return,
  457:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  458:      {load,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}}] = X1,
  459: 
  460:     %% Simple translation (2)
  461:     Up2 = [{add_application, test}],
  462:     {ok, X2} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up2], Apps, []),
  463:     io:format("X2=~p~n", [X2]),
  464:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  465:      point_of_no_return,
  466:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  467:      {load,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  468:      {load,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  469:      {apply,{application,start,[test,permanent]}}] = X2,
  470: 
  471:     %% Translate add_application with different restart types
  472:     %%  permanent
  473:     Up2_1 = [{add_application, test, permanent}],
  474:     {ok, X2_1} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up2_1], Apps, []),
  475:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  476:      point_of_no_return,
  477:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  478:      {load,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  479:      {load,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  480:      {apply,{application,start,[test,permanent]}}] = X2_1,
  481: 
  482:     %%  transient
  483:     Up2_2 = [{add_application, test, transient}],
  484:     {ok, X2_2} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up2_2], Apps, []),
  485:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  486:      point_of_no_return,
  487:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  488:      {load,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  489:      {load,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  490:      {apply,{application,start,[test,transient]}}] = X2_2,
  491: 
  492:     %%  temporary
  493:     Up2_3 = [{add_application, test, temporary}],
  494:     {ok, X2_3} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up2_3], Apps, []),
  495:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  496:      point_of_no_return,
  497:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  498:      {load,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  499:      {load,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  500:      {apply,{application,start,[test,temporary]}}] = X2_3,
  501: 
  502:     %%  load
  503:     Up2_4 = [{add_application, test, load}],
  504:     {ok, X2_4} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up2_4], Apps, []),
  505:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  506:      point_of_no_return,
  507:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  508:      {load,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  509:      {load,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  510:      {apply,{application,load,[test]}}] = X2_4,
  511: 
  512:     %%  none
  513:     Up2_5 = [{add_application, test, none}],
  514:     {ok, X2_5} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up2_5], Apps, []),
  515:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  516:      point_of_no_return,
  517:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  518:      {load,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  519:      {load,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}}] = X2_5,
  520: 
  521:     %% Simple translation (3)
  522:     Up3 = [{remove_application, pelle}],
  523:     {ok, X3} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up3], Apps, PreApps),
  524:     [point_of_no_return,
  525:      {apply,{application,stop,[pelle]}},
  526:      {remove,{pelle,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  527:      {remove,{kalle,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  528:      {purge,[pelle,kalle]},
  529:      {apply,{application,unload,[pelle]}}] = X3,
  530: 
  531:     %% Simple translation (4)
  532:     Up4 = [{restart_application, test}],
  533:     {ok, X4} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up4], Apps, PreApps),
  534:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  535:      point_of_no_return,
  536:      {apply,{application,stop,[test]}},
  537:      {remove,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  538:      {remove,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  539:      {remove,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  540:      {purge,[foo,bar,baz]},
  541:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  542:      {load,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  543:      {load,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  544:      {apply,{application,start,[test,permanent]}}] = X4,
  545: 
  546:     %% Translate restart_application with different restart types
  547:     %%  permanent
  548:     {ok, X4_1} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up4],
  549: 					       [Test#application{type=permanent}],
  550: 					       [Test]),
  551:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  552:      point_of_no_return,
  553:      {apply,{application,stop,[test]}},
  554:      {remove,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  555:      {remove,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  556:      {remove,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  557:      {purge,[foo,bar,baz]},
  558:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  559:      {load,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  560:      {load,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  561:      {apply,{application,start,[test,permanent]}}] = X4_1,
  562: 
  563:     %%  transient
  564:     {ok, X4_2} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up4],
  565: 					       [Test#application{type=transient}],
  566: 					       [Test]),
  567:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  568:      point_of_no_return,
  569:      {apply,{application,stop,[test]}},
  570:      {remove,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  571:      {remove,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  572:      {remove,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  573:      {purge,[foo,bar,baz]},
  574:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  575:      {load,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  576:      {load,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  577:      {apply,{application,start,[test,transient]}}] = X4_2,
  578: 
  579:     %%  temporary
  580:     {ok, X4_3} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up4],
  581: 					       [Test#application{type=temporary}],
  582: 					       [Test]),
  583:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  584:      point_of_no_return,
  585:      {apply,{application,stop,[test]}},
  586:      {remove,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  587:      {remove,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  588:      {remove,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  589:      {purge,[foo,bar,baz]},
  590:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  591:      {load,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  592:      {load,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  593:      {apply,{application,start,[test,temporary]}}] = X4_3,
  594: 
  595:     %%  load
  596:     {ok, X4_4} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up4],
  597: 					       [Test#application{type=load}],
  598: 					       [Test]),
  599:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  600:      point_of_no_return,
  601:      {apply,{application,stop,[test]}},
  602:      {remove,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  603:      {remove,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  604:      {remove,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  605:      {purge,[foo,bar,baz]},
  606:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  607:      {load,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  608:      {load,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  609:      {apply,{application,load,[test]}}] = X4_4,
  610: 
  611:     %%  none
  612:     {ok, X4_5} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up4],
  613: 					       [Test#application{type=none}],
  614: 					       [Test]),
  615:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[foo,bar,baz]}},
  616:      point_of_no_return,
  617:      {apply,{application,stop,[test]}},
  618:      {remove,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  619:      {remove,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  620:      {remove,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  621:      {purge,[foo,bar,baz]},
  622:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  623:      {load,{bar,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  624:      {load,{baz,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}}] = X4_5,
  625: 
  626:     ok.
  627: 
  628: 
  629: translate_emulator_restarts(_Config) ->
  630:     Apps =
  631: 	[#application{name = test,
  632: 		      description = "TEST",
  633: 		      vsn = "1.0",
  634: 		      modules = [foo,bar,baz],
  635: 		      regs = [],
  636: 		      mod = {sasl, []}},
  637: 	 #application{name = test,
  638: 		      description = "TEST2",
  639: 		      vsn = "1.0",
  640: 		      modules = [x,y,z],
  641: 		      regs = [],
  642: 		      mod = {sasl, []}}],
  643:     %% restart_new_emulator
  644:     Up1 = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, []},restart_new_emulator],
  645:     {ok, X1} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up1], Apps, []),
  646:     [restart_new_emulator,
  647:      {load_object_code, {test,"1.0",[foo]}},
  648:      point_of_no_return,
  649:      {suspend,[foo]},
  650:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  651:      {resume,[foo]}] = X1,
  652: 
  653:     %% restart_emulator
  654:     Up2 = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, []},restart_emulator],
  655:     {ok, X2} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up2], Apps, []),
  656:     [{load_object_code, {test,"1.0",[foo]}},
  657:      point_of_no_return,
  658:      {suspend,[foo]},
  659:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  660:      {resume,[foo]},
  661:      restart_emulator] = X2,
  662: 
  663:     %% restart_emulator + restart_new_emulator
  664:     Up3 = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, []},
  665: 	   restart_emulator,
  666: 	   restart_new_emulator],
  667:     {ok, X3} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up3], Apps, []),
  668:     [restart_new_emulator,
  669:      {load_object_code, {test,"1.0",[foo]}},
  670:      point_of_no_return,
  671:      {suspend,[foo]},
  672:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  673:      {resume,[foo]},
  674:      restart_emulator] = X3,
  675: 
  676:     %% restart_emulator + restart_new_emulator
  677:     Up4a = [{update, foo, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, []},
  678: 	    restart_emulator,
  679: 	    restart_new_emulator],
  680:     Up4b = [restart_new_emulator,
  681: 	    {update, x, soft, soft_purge, soft_purge, []},
  682: 	    restart_emulator,
  683: 	    restart_emulator],
  684:     {ok, X4} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up4a,Up4b], Apps, []),
  685:     [restart_new_emulator,
  686:      {load_object_code, {test,"1.0",[foo,x]}},
  687:      point_of_no_return,
  688:      {suspend,[foo]},
  689:      {load,{foo,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  690:      {resume,[foo]},
  691:      {suspend,[x]},
  692:      {load,{x,soft_purge,soft_purge}},
  693:      {resume,[x]},
  694:      restart_emulator] = X4,
  695: 
  696:     %% only restart_new_emulator
  697:     Up5 = [restart_new_emulator],
  698:     {ok, X5} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up5], Apps, []),
  699:     [restart_new_emulator,
  700:      point_of_no_return] = X5,
  701: 
  702:     %% only restart_emulator
  703:     Up6 = [restart_emulator],
  704:     {ok, X6} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([Up6], Apps, []),
  705:     [point_of_no_return,
  706:      restart_emulator] = X6,
  707: 
  708:     ok.
  709: 
  710: translate_add_delete_module(_Config) ->
  711:     PreApps =
  712: 	[#application{name = test,
  713: 		      description = "TEST",
  714: 		      vsn = "0.1",
  715: 		      modules = [foo,bar,baz,old_mod],
  716: 		      regs = [],
  717: 		      mod = {sasl, []}}],
  718:     Apps =
  719: 	[#application{name = test,
  720: 		      description = "TEST",
  721: 		      vsn = "1.0",
  722: 		      modules = [foo,bar,baz,new_mod],
  723: 		      regs = [],
  724: 		      mod = {sasl, []}}],
  725:     S1 = [
  726: 	  {delete_module, old_mod},
  727: 	  {add_module, new_mod},
  728: 	  {load_module, foo}
  729: 	 ],
  730:     {ok, X1} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S1], Apps, PreApps),
  731:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[new_mod,foo]}},
  732:      point_of_no_return,
  733:      {remove,{old_mod,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  734:      {purge,[old_mod]},
  735:      {load,{new_mod,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  736:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}}] = X1,
  737: 
  738:     S2 = [
  739: 	  {delete_module, old_mod},
  740: 	  {add_module, new_mod, [foo]},
  741: 	  {load_module, foo}
  742: 	 ],
  743:     {ok, X2} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S2], Apps, PreApps),
  744:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[new_mod,foo]}},
  745:      point_of_no_return,
  746:      {remove,{old_mod,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  747:      {purge,[old_mod]},
  748:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  749:      {load,{new_mod,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}}] = X2,
  750: 
  751:     S3 = [
  752: 	  {delete_module, old_mod, [new_mod]},
  753: 	  {add_module, new_mod, [foo]},
  754: 	  {load_module, foo}
  755: 	 ],
  756:     {ok, X3} = systools_rc:translate_scripts([S3], Apps, PreApps),
  757:     [{load_object_code,{test,"1.0",[new_mod,foo]}},
  758:      point_of_no_return,
  759:      {load,{foo,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  760:      {load,{new_mod,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  761:      {remove,{old_mod,brutal_purge,brutal_purge}},
  762:      {purge,[old_mod]}] = X3,
  763: 
  764:     ok.
